divs: Sighting DetailsIt was Friday the 22nd of October 2005. We ( my dad, sister, and me ) watched a bright star twinkle at the top of the sky. my sister and I went inside to get something to eat and to look at halloween costumes. Then we went back outside and all of the sudden it shot down across the sky and stopped near another star. It then started moving slowly away from the star. it got brighter and changed from an orange color to a bright green. then the color faded away. Emma, Chloe, and Andrew Cox
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Gainesville
There were no other sightings in Gainesville on or around October 22nd 2004
Summary: Small star-like glowing round dot. Shoots across the sky.
